author: Burcu G
title: Perfect Location, clean hotel
text: Location is perfect. Staff is very friendly and helpful. Hotel is clean. I used parking of hotel and it is 20â‚¬ per night. It is good price for paris center. You have privite parking in locked area. Also shopping center is very close. Tax free desk is in same building. There is very useful metro line near hotel.
